values.description: The base URL of your Egeria OMAG Server Platform, including the 'http://' prefix
The user name of the user carrying out operations within the Egeria OMAG Server Platform
The name of the server within the Platform in which to carry out operations
The name of the cohort with which the server should interact
The Apache Kafka endpoint (hostname:port) to use for Egeria's event bus
The hostname or IP address of an IBM Information Server domain tier
The secure REST API port for an IBM Information Server domain tier
The username with which to connect to IBM Information Governance Catalog's REST API
The password with which to connect to IBM Information Governance Catalog's REST API
The endpoint (host:port) on which to connect to IBM Information Server's embedded Apache Kafka bus
The hostname or IP address of an Apache Atlas server
The REST API port for an Apache Atlas server
The username with which to connect to Apache Atlas's REST API
The password with which to connect to Apache Atlas's REST API
The endpoint (host:port) on which to connect to Apache Atlas's embedded Apache Kafka bus
